擪字的基本解释

擪
yè
（用手指）按压。
压；压抑：“桂花风雨较凉些，愁字儿难藏擪。”
书法执笔法之一。
拿着。

擪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》於葉切，入葉，影。］
［《廣韻》於琰切，上琰，影。］
亦作“擫1”。
(1)用手指按压。
(2)紧束。
(3)犹压抑。
(4)盖住；合拢。
(5)持。
(6)书法执笔法之一。以大拇指紧按笔管左内方。

擪字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擪； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页460第14
【唐韻】於葉切【集韻】【韻會】益涉切，?音靨。讀若厭入聲。【說文】一指按也。【莊子·外物篇】擪其顪。【元稹·連昌宮辭】李謩擪笛傍宮牆。　又【正韻】弋涉切，音葉。義同。　又【集韻】託協切，音帖。又諾協切，音敜。或作壓。義?同。　又乙甲切，音壓。亦按也。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?於琰切，音黶。持也。亦作擫。古文通厭。

擪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擪字的起名意思

暂无。

Hafnium
Basic explanation of words
Hafnium
yè
Press (with fingers).
Depression: "Osmanthus fragrans is cooler in wind and rain, and it's hard to hide the words of sorrow."
One of calligraphy writing methods.
Hold it.
Hafnium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guangyun" cuts into the leaves, enters the leaves, and shadows. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Yan cut, Shang Yan, shadow. ]
Also known as "擫1".
(1) Press with your fingers.
(2) Tighten up.
(3) Still depressed.
(4) Cover; close.
(5) Hold.
(6) One of calligraphy writing methods. Press tightly on the inner left side of the pen barrel with your thumb.
Hafnium
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　擪; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 460-14
[Tang Yun] Yu Yeqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yisheqie,? Yin Diao. If you are tired of reading it. [Speaking] Press with one finger. 【Zhuangzi·Foreign Objects】Hit his head. [Yuan Zhen·Lianchang Palace Ci] Li Qin's flute next to the palace wall.　[Zheng Yun] Yishe cut, sound leaf. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] Toxie cut, audio note. Also promised to cut, soundtrack. Or make pressure. Righteous? Same.　 Another cut, sound pressure. Also press also.　 [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Yan cut, sound. Hold also. Also for 擫. Old text is boring.
